name: floral-healing
flavor_text: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.
effect_text_extend: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.
effect_text_simple: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
